task_description: Generate a 3D cartoon-style takeaway packaging icon for restaurant branding, featuring a cute Q-version food container with opened lid, visible handle, and golden food peeking out. Style should match Pixar 3D aesthetic with clean composition for icon usage.

input_data.text_prompt: A professional 3D icon design of a cute takeaway food container in Pixar cartoon style. The main subject is a white rounded square or trapezoidal takeaway box (#F5F5DC, #FFFAF0) with smooth edges and glossy plastic texture. The lid is slightly opened revealing golden delicious food (#FFD700) inside with appetizing highlights. A clear visible handle on top of the box. Deep blue brand color accents (#2B4A7C) on the box edge or label area. Optional red logo spot (#FF6347). High-quality 3D rendering with two light sources: top light and 45-degree front light creating soft shadows. 3/4 front view with slight bird's eye angle. Clean pure white background. The icon conveys convenience, quality and portable takeaway concept. Smooth rounded corners on all edges. Plastic/paper box texture with surface highlights. The handle has strong three-dimensional feel. Simple brand logo area visible. Commercial-grade quality with Pixar aesthetic. 1024x1024px high resolution. Professional icon design suitable for restaurant app and branding materials.
input_data.style: 3D Icon Design, Pixar Cartoon Aesthetic, Professional Restaurant Branding
design_requirements: 3D rendered Q-version takeaway box with cute proportions
Lid slightly opened showing golden food inside
Clear visible handle with three-dimensional depth
White/beige box color (#F5F5DC, #FFFAF0) with smooth texture
Deep blue brand accent (#2B4A7C) matching IP character
Golden food color (#FFD700) with appetizing glow
Optional red label area (#FF6347) for logo placement
Rounded edges on all corners for cute appearance
3/4 front view with slight top-down angle
Two-light setup: top + 45-degree front for soft shadows
Conveys portable takeaway and convenience concept
Matches style with dining-in icon for consistent branding
Clean composition suitable for icon usage
Pixar-style cartoon aesthetics with professional finish

metadata.notes: 3D takeaway packaging icon matching Pixar style reference, designed to pair with dining-in icon for restaurant branding system
